description: CentOS Linux 7 CIS Benchmark v3.1.2 - Section 1.2

controls.title: Ensure GPG keys are configured
controls.description: Most packages managers implement GPG key signing to verify package integrity during installation.
controls.rationale: It is important to ensure that updates are obtained from a valid source to protect against spoofing that could lead to the inadvertent installation of malware on the system.
controls.remediation: : Update your package manager GPG keys in accordance with site policy. 76 | P a g e CIS Controls: Controls Version Control IG 1 IG 2 IG 3 v8 7.3 Perform Automated Operating System Patch Management Perform operating system updates on enterprise assets through automated patch management on a monthly, or more frequent, basis. ● ● ● v8 7.4 Perform Automated Application Patch Management Perform application updates on enterprise assets through automated patch management on a monthly, or more frequent, basis. ● ● ● v7 3.4 Deploy Automated Operating System Patch Management Tools Deploy au tomated software update tools in order to ensure that the operating systems are running the most recent security updates provided by the software vendor. ● ● ● v7 3.5 Deploy Automated Software Patch Management Tools Deploy automated software update tools in order to ensure that third -party software on all systems is running the most recent security updates provided by the software vendor. ● ● ● 77 | P a g e
controls.audit_command: Verify GPG keys are configured correctly for your package manager. Depending on t he package management in use one of the following command groups may provide the needed information: # rpm -q gpg-pubkey --qf '%{name} -%{version} -%{release} --> %{summary} \n'

controls.title: Ensure package manager repositories are configured
controls.description: Systems need to have package manager repositories configured to ensure they receive the latest patches and updates.
controls.rationale: If a system's package repositories are misconfigured important patches may not be identified or a rogue repository could introduce compromised software.
controls.remediation: : Configure your package manager repositories according to site policy. 78 | P a g e CIS Controls: Controls Version Control IG 1 IG 2 IG 3 v8 7.3 Perform Automated Operating System Patch Management Perform operating system updates on enterprise assets through automated patch management on a monthly, or more frequent, basis. ● ● ● v8 7.4 Perform Automated Application Patch Management Perform application updates on enterprise assets through automated patch management on a monthly, or more frequent, basis. ● ● ● v7 3.4 Deploy Automated Operating System Patch Management Tools Deploy automated soft ware update tools in order to ensure that the operating systems are running the most recent security updates provided by the software vendor. ● ● ● v7 3.5 Deploy Automated Software Patch Management Tools Deploy automated software update tools in order to ensure that third -party software on all systems is running the most recent security updates provided by the software vendor. ● ● ● 79 | P a g e
controls.audit_command: Run the following command to verify repositories are configured correctly: # yum repolist
